org.unbunt.ella.engine.context
Interface Context

All Superinterfaces:
SQLResultProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultContext
public interface Context
extends SQLResultProvider

Represents the execution context of EllaScript programs.

The execution context holds the global environment, information about the executed program, such as filename, the associated resource object, associations of native EllaScript objects to their implicit parent objects as well as references to various core objects.

Method Detail

registerProto

void registerProto(int objectID,
                   int protoID)
Associates a native EllaScript object with it's implicit parent object.

Parameters:
objectID - the object id referencing the native EllaScript object the implicit parent object should be associated with.
protoID - the object id referencing the implicit parent object

registerObject

void registerObject(Obj object)
Registers a native EllaScript object with this context. After registration this object may then be referenced by it's object id.

Parameters:
object - the native EllaScript object to register.

getObjectProto

Obj getObjectProto(Obj obj)
Returns the implicit parent object associated with the given native object.

Parameters:
obj - the native EllaScript object for which the implicit parent object should be returned.
Returns:
the implicit parent object or null if no implicit parent object is associated with the given object.

hasObject

boolean hasObject(int objectID)
Returns true if a native EllaScript object specified by the given object id is registered within this context.

Parameters:
objectID - the object id to look for.
Returns:
true if such an object if registered within this context.

Returns the global environment associated with this context.

Returns:
the environment object.

setEnv

void setEnv(Env env)
Set the given environment as global environment in this context.

Parameters:
env - the environment to use as global environment.
